text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: "A rowan tree with a large hollow near its base stands out…" ……Mm, this is the "Lonely River" for sure!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: A large hollow…… that thing? Oh, sorry I keep asking stuff! I really wanted to prepare for what's in store!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But I couldn't quite find the original movie. I may have to rely on you today, Rob Roy.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (That's right… I'm the only one who knows the story. …… I-I have to stand firm……!)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: T-The challenge for us here is to cross the stone path over the river and retrieve the stone from the pedestal.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ¿Que? But I don't see a stone path or pedestal anywheeere!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: There's actually a mechanism for that……! When you flip a switch, the stones and pedestal rise up from the river!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: And that switch is right here, in the hollow at the base of this big tree— ……Huh?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: T-That's strange… there should be a switch here… Instead, there's something written… "The forest's longest beard"…?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Maybe they changed it because there wouldn't be much riddle solving if it was the same as the movie?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ahh…! Of course……! Uuuh… ummm… Let's start by looking for it……!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ¡Uuuf, It is nowhere to be found! What is "the forest's longest beard" anywayyy?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hey, El-chan, El-chan! Lookie here, this ivy is crazy thick and long～! Stretches from the top of this tree… all the way to the river!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: It's so thick you can swing on iiit! Tannhäuser, go!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Roger! Swingy-swing shingali～ng! Ahaha, I'll be the best ape ever―
(……CLICK)

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ……Click?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ……… Ah! Is this the "switch"?!
(BOMBOMBOMBOM……!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……? Uh, what's that sound?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Wow!? Look at that! Stones are rising from the river!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Has someone found the switch? Let's see, when the stone appears…… what do we do again?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I-I'm sorry! Um, we have to go right away. I-I'll be right there—

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Calm down, Rob Roy! What's going on?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: …… Well, if this contraption is the same as in "Rhodonite", the stone will only be up for a few minutes……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: So it's time-limited. Then can't we press the switch agai—

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: That won't work. "By moonlight, the magic replenishes―" In other words, this contraption can only move once a day…!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Wao!? Then we can't miss it! Okay, I'm confident in my speed!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Wait, hey……!? Ah, T-Taiki……!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: ―Quickly, carefully…! Hop hop…… hup! Whoa, it's pretty slippery.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I-is she going to be okay… If she doesn't get back quick the stone will sink, right?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Yes…! I believe you are actually supposed to get there holding a long ivy that stretches all the way here as a safety precaution, but we haven't found that yet……!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Ohh! Is that so!? But…… don't worry! I've almost reached this rock―
(Zb…… Shzszs……)

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: !? My foothold is sin—
(SPLAAASH! )

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: ―Pwaah! What!? I-I'm drifting away!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: MACHITAN APOLOGY FIRE!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Tannhauser!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I think I just hit the switchy thing, sorry! ……You got a hold of me, Taiki? Then here we go!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Care for an ivy back to safety, milady? Heh.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yes! Super Rescue!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Oh… what a relief………
